original: intros T U F G filterF f g F_fforall filterlim_f_F_G. unfold filterlimi in *. apply filterlim_comp with (H:=G). - auto. - apply filtermapi_filter with (P:= fun x => forall y : U, f x y <-> g x y) in F_fforall; try auto. apply filter_and. + auto. + intros x1 x2 H1 H2 y. split; intros H. * rewrite <- H1, <- H. apply H2. *
